# The `ilist_node.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines the ilist&#95;node class template, which is a convenient base class for creating classes that can be used with ilists. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file defines the ilist&#95;node class template, which is a convenient base class for creating classes that can be used with ilists.

<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Under-approximation, but always available for assertions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">node&#95;base&#95;type::isKnownSentinel;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check whether this is the sentinel node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This requires sentinel tracking to be explicitly enabled.  Use the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ilist&#95;sentinel&#95;tracking&lt;true&gt; option to get this API.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#a0570092282570244c4d7af86003f0aa9"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#a0570092282570244c4d7af86003f0aa9">isSentinel</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(OptionsT::is&#95;sentinel&#95;tracking&#95;explicit,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Use ilist&#95;sentinel&#95;tracking&lt;true&gt; to enable isSentinel()&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> node&#95;base&#95;type::isSentinel();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An intrusive list node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A base class to enable membership in intrusive lists, including \\a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">/// simple&#95;ilist, \\a iplist, and \\a ilist.  The first template parameter is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\a value&#95;type for the list.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An ilist node can be configured with compile-time options to change</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">/// behaviour and/or add API.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">/// By default, an \\a ilist&#95;node knows whether it is the list sentinel (an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instance of \\a ilist&#95;sentinel) if and only if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;ABI&#95;BREAKING&#95;CHECKS.  The function \\a isKnownSentinel() always</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">/// returns \\c false tracking is off.  Sentinel tracking steals a bit from the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &quot;prev&quot; link, which adds a mask operation when decrementing an iterator, but</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">/// enables bug-finding assertions in \\a ilist&#95;iterator.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">/// To turn sentinel tracking on all the time, pass in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ilist&#95;sentinel&#95;tracking&lt;true&gt; template parameter.  This also enables the \\a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">/// isSentinel() function.  The same option must be passed to the intrusive</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">/// list.  (ilist&#95;sentinel&#95;tracking&lt;false&gt; turns sentinel tracking off all the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">/// time.)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A type can inherit from ilist&#95;node multiple times by passing in different</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\a ilist&#95;tag options.  This allows a single instance to be inserted into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">/// multiple lists simultaneously, where each list is given the same tag.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\example</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">/// struct A &#123;&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">/// struct B &#123;&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">/// struct N : ilist&#95;node&lt;N, ilist&#95;tag&lt;A&gt;&gt;, ilist&#95;node&lt;N, ilist&#95;tag&lt;B&gt;&gt; &#123;&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">/// void foo() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">///   simple&#95;ilist&lt;N, ilist&#95;tag&lt;A&gt;&gt; ListA;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">///   simple&#95;ilist&lt;N, ilist&#95;tag&lt;B&gt;&gt; ListB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">///   N N1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ListA.push&#95;back(N1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ListB.push&#95;back(N1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endexample</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">/// When the \\a ilist&#95;parent&lt;ParentTy&gt; option is passed to an ilist&#95;node and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">/// owning ilist, each node contains a pointer to the ilist&#39;s owner. This adds</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\a getParent() and \\a setParent(ParentTy&#42;) methods to the ilist&#95;node, which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">/// will be used for node access by the ilist if the node class publicly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">/// inherits from \\a ilist&#95;node&#95;with&#95;parent. By default, setParent() is not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">/// automatically called by the ilist; a SymbolTableList will call setParent()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">/// on inserted nodes, but the sentinel must still be manually set after the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">/// list is created (e.g. SymTabList.end()-&gt;setParent(Parent)).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The primary benefit of using ilist&#95;parent is that a parent</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pointer will be stored in the sentinel, meaning that you can safely use \\a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ilist&#95;iterator::getNodeParent() to get the node parent from any valid (i.e.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">/// non-null) iterator, even one that points to a sentinel value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">/// See \\a is&#95;valid&#95;option for steps on adding a new option.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An ilist node that can access its parent list.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Requires \\c NodeTy to have \\a getParent() to find the parent node, and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\c ParentTy to have \\a getSublistAccess() to get a reference to the list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ParentTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">... <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
